content.text:
# Draft:Puppet Rebellion

Puppet Rebellion are an English indie rock band from Manchester, formed in 2013.
They were active within the city's alternative music scene and have released several independent EPs and an album.
History
The band formed in 2013 and began performing across Manchester venues such as Night & Day Café and AATMA.
Early releases included the EPs Chemical Friends (2014) and No Means Yes (2015).
A later album, Chemical Friends (2017), continued their guitar-driven indie style.
Reception
Local coverage described the group’s sound as energetic and melodic.
Salford Now reviewed a live performance at AATMA in 2016.
Members
* Oliver Davies – vocals
* Paul Trochowski – lead guitar
* James Halliwell – bass guitar
* Craig Gibson - rhythm guitar
* Henry Rogers – drums
References
